title: Chemistry Lab Tech- Entry Level
full_description: Chemistry Lab Technician - Dallas, TX Entry Level As a Chemistry Lab Technician placed with Kelly Scientific Resources, you will be responsible for conducting quality control tests on raw material and product samples per company quality control test methods. Additional Responsibilities: + Ensure timely testing and data recording for all samples + Issuing of COAs to customers + Coordinate responses to customer inquiries and plant management inquiries through Quality Manager + Support plant operations' and customer quality and process efficiency programs + Customer complaints/Internal Quality Issues/Investigate and provide feedback + Follow Lab Safety and regulatory procedures (OSHA, HAZCOM, labeling, MSDS) + Prepare and distribute labels to production staff for packaging + Calibrate and evaluate all QC equipment + Assist Quality Manager with projects Job Requirements: + Bachelor's degree in Chemistry, Biochemistry, Biology or related field + College Chemistry coursework + Wet chemistry skills + pH, viscosity, manual titrations + Strong Math skills + M-F; 6am-2:30pm + Temp-to-Hire Why Kelly **** ?
